algorithm_technique: Linear scan to find the k-th space
problem_summary_simple: Truncate a sentence to its first k words.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the string, counting spaces to find the end of the k-th word.
key_insights: The problem requires identifying the boundary after the k-th word.
Spaces are the delimiters between words.
A single pass through the string, counting spaces, is sufficient.
If k spaces are found, the truncation point is just before the k-th space.
